New Records: Brooks Lee had a five-RBI day, including a two-run single and a three-run triple
Key Match Events: The Twins scratched together a three-run, go-ahead rally in the sixth, highlighted by Lee's two-run single
Lee's triple down the right-field line in the seventh
Carlos Santana hit a two-run homer, his team-leading 22nd
Pre-Game Insights: The Twins were playing without their two best hitters in the lineup and needed a win to avoid a back-breaking sweep
Manager Rocco Baldelli had preached to right the ship, but something seemed to change after the Twins' rally
Post-Match Reflections: Lee expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Manager Rocco Baldelli highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins' lead for the final AL Wild Card slot held steady at 2 1/2 games
The Twins' deficit behind the division-leading Guardians is 6 1/2 games
The Twins have four more head-to-head matchups slated to begin on Monday in Cleveland
